languages.text: {n}Лицо Ардженты мрачнеет.{/n} "Это было милосердием. Смерть освободила их от служения чудовищной мерзости, да смилостивится над их душами Император".

traits.locale_text: {n}Лицо Ардженты мрачнеет.{/n} "Это было милосердием. Смерть освободила их от служения чудовищной мерзости, да смилостивится над их душами Император".

languages.text: {n}Argenta's expression grows sombre.{/n} "It was merciful. Death has released them from serving a horrific beast. May the Emperor take pity on their souls."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Ардженты мрачнеет.{/n} "Это было милосердием. Смерть освободила их от служения чудовищной мерзости, да смилостивится над их душами Император".

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta's expression grows sombre.{/n} "It was merciful. Death has released them from serving a horrific beast. May the Emperor have mercy upon their souls now."

{n}Argenta's expression grows sombre.{/n} "It was merciful. Death has released them from serving a horrific beast. May the Emperor take pity on their souls."

languages.text: {n}La expresión de Argenta se ensombrece.{/n} «Fue por piedad. La Muerte les ha librado de servir a una bestia horrible. Que el Emperador se apiade de sus almas».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression grows sombre.{/n} "It was merciful. Death has released them from serving a horrific beast. May the Emperor take pity on their souls."

traits.locale_text: {n}La expresión de Argenta se ensombrece.{/n} «Fue por piedad. La Muerte les ha librado de servir a una bestia horrible. Que el Emperador se apiade de sus almas».

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタの表情が暗くなった。{/n} 「慈悲深いことだった。死が彼らを恐ろしい獣に仕えることから解放してくれた。皇帝が彼らの魂を憐れんでくださいますように」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression grows sombre.{/n} "It was merciful. Death has released them from serving a horrific beast. May the Emperor take pity on their souls."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタの表情が暗くなった。{/n} 「慈悲深いことだった。死が彼らを恐ろしい獣に仕えることから解放してくれた。皇帝が彼らの魂を憐れんでくださいますように」

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔的表情变得阴沉起来。{/n}“那是仁慈之举，死亡让那些人挣开了怪物的束缚，得到了解脱。愿帝皇垂怜他们的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression grows sombre.{/n} "It was merciful. Death has released them from serving a horrific beast. May the Emperor take pity on their souls."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔的表情变得阴沉起来。{/n}“那是仁慈之举，死亡让那些人挣开了怪物的束缚，得到了解脱。愿帝皇垂怜他们的灵魂。”

languages.text: {n}Argentas Miene verfinstert sich.{/n} "Das war gnädig. Der Tod hat sie davor bewahrt, einer entsetzlichen Bestie zu dienen. Möge der Imperator ihrer Seelen gnädig sein."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression grows sombre.{/n} "It was merciful. Death has released them from serving a horrific beast. May the Emperor take pity on their souls."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argentas Miene verfinstert sich.{/n} "Das war gnädig. Der Tod hat sie davor bewahrt, einer entsetzlichen Bestie zu dienen. Möge der Imperator ihrer Seelen gnädig sein."

languages.text: {n}L'expression d'Argenta s'assombrit.{/n} « C'était un service à leur rendre. La mort leur a permis d'échapper à la servitude aux mains d'une bête effroyable. Puisse l'Empereur avoir pitié de leurs âmes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression grows sombre.{/n} "It was merciful. Death has released them from serving a horrific beast. May the Emperor take pity on their souls."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'expression d'Argenta s'assombrit.{/n} « C'était un service à leur rendre. La mort leur a permis d'échapper à la servitude aux mains d'une bête effroyable. Puisse l'Empereur avoir pitié de leurs âmes. »

languages.text: {n}Argenta'nın yüzüne kasvetli bir ifade çöküyor.{/n} "Merhamet gördüler. Ölüm, onları korkunç bir canavara hizmetten azat etti. İmparator ruhlarına insaf etsin."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression grows sombre.{/n} "It was merciful. Death has released them from serving a horrific beast. May the Emperor take pity on their souls."
